website_summaries.verdict: Though the style may not be for all men, this Michael Kors watch looks good enough to wear with almost any style or for numerous occasions, and it comes at a value price that's hard to beat.
pros: A good-looking chronograph watch with date window and three subdials
Sturdy stainless-steel craftsmanship in silver-tone finish
Classic look makes it practical for wearing every day
cons: Some men with small wrists may find this watch a bit overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a woman but plastic looking ring inside
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch. Very sturdy yet delicate enough for a petite wrist. Unfortunately, on the inside of the face, there is a plastic looking ring. I suppose it’s for decoration. To me it looks cheap. I couldn’t see it in the product photos. I’m disappointed in the tacky face. Other than that... very nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in rose gold and believe me, I get more compliments on it than my Rado, Tag, Omega and Movado. So, I bought the silvertone and it's beautiful. This is a well made time piece that looks like you spent thousands. It's on the bigger side which I like. It's original MK without a doubt. For the price, don't think - just buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Sahni

customer_reviews.title: This watch is absolutely beautiful and breathtaking
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely beautiful and breathtaking. It is listed as a men's watch but I ordered it for myself (female) and looks amazing even though my wrist is very narrow. The face is big and bold so if you're not into boyfriend style watches then this particular watch is not for you. I had to remove several links for a good fit well. It goes well with any outfit, overall great product. I would like to add I ordered this watch from Jomashop and I had a great experience buying from this seller. My order arrived on time and packaging was excellent. Great experience, would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLvsShoes

customer_reviews.title: MK is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is most beautiful heavy-duty MK watch I've had yet!! It came packaged very well & there is absolutely no doubt it's authentic. It is has a large face & wide band, definitely a man's watch. I like his large face watches though because they are usually simple & not some big guady thing. I'm in love!! Very very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Classic Watch With Masculine Appeal
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic watch! Classic looks, rugged materials, and even though I've only had it a few days I've received many compliments on it. It's a very masculine feeling timepiece, with some real weight to it although it doesn't feel "heavy" when wearing it. UPDATE: After about a year the watch started eating batteries left and right. I really wish it’d keep working more than 6-8 weeks before requiring a new battery, because I live the look of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: halfbrown

customer_reviews.title: Bad.
customer_reviews.text: The "20" is in the "60" place, and so on... Great.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi G.

customer_reviews.title: The band will break. Not might. WILL BREAK.
customer_reviews.text: have had this watch for 3 years. The band has broken 5 or 6 times during that time, Yesterday the whole band fell APART. not just a pin but each individual link across 5 links completely separated from each other and I cant find a replacement band for it so It's completely junk now. Purchased from JOMASHOP but they wouldn't help me a year ago with it, theyre certainly not going to help me now.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch 10/10
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...but DANG THIS IS A NICE WATCH FOR THE PRIce!! Woooo Best Buy in Amazon so far 😂👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Geodeguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch to gift
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my friend for his wedding and he likes it a lot. Nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Pragathish Gopalan

customer_reviews.title: excellent professional-looking watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a professional-looking watch and ended up buying this one because it was on sale. Been using it for about two months now, and absolutely love it. Received many compliments on how clean this watch looks. I don't use the stopwatch feature very often, but everything else is exactly as advertised. One FYI for future buyers -- pins separating the links in the wristband are quite hard to remove. When I first got the watch, I struggled with the pins for about an hour before giving up and spending $15 for a local jeweler to adjust the wristband.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in pictures. Cheapishy. MK outlet?
customer_reviews.text: Go big or go home. Cheap looking. I can do better in Chinatown. MK? Ouch?!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality watch..looks elegant & bold.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but realized couple scratches just the top links both sides 🤷🏻‍♂️after opening might be a floor item?
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Very Handsome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new husband as a wedding gift. It arrives in a very heavy, cherry wood-looking watch case. My husbband has a quite few watches, but not a MK watch. He was highly impressed with it and absolutely loves the whole design. I was very pleased with the shipping/delivery of the watch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for a Christmas present. It fell on the floor from a table about 2 ft off the ground and one of the hands on the watch busted off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mens watch!
customer_reviews.text: Just an incredible piece of mens jewelry! Great style , quality, weight . More than thrilled with this purchase!! Would 100% recommend this purchase for anyone looking for a great mens watch! Came in 2 days with free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Watch
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch! I was worried that it was going to be too big since it's a men's watch. I'm a petite female with small wrists. I had 3 links removed and it fits exactly the way I wanted it to. It has a large face and it's heavy...I absolutely love this watch! I can wear it dressed up or casual. I get lots of complements on it. The price from the seller was great compared to price in department stores. The shipping was fast and it was packed well. Very happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: LisaM

customer_reviews.title: clean looking product..
customer_reviews.text: Clean piece. Didn't know what I was expecting. Was kind of nervous of some of the bad reviews it got. Paid for expedited shipping. It came a day early. Watch itself looks really good. Silver tone is clean. Face of the watch is big. My husband loves it. Need to adjust the links to fit his wrist. Would look good on a women's wrist also. All buttons and nobs work. Very satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: christin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase I was a little nervous because I have never spent that much on a watch before but I gave it to my husband for a 25th wedding anniversary gift this year and was very pleased with the purchase we have to get a few links taken off to fit his wrist better but other than that that it was worth every penny and he luvs it
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: MK8086 Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I bought it as a gift for my niece. It is so elegant and classy ! Although it is a man's watch a woman can wear it. Very happy with my purchaser, with the delivery and the packaging ! Thanks !

customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch! High quality and looks great! Got it for my husbands birthday! He loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was WAY below retail price. The fit is super big so just be aware that you'll have to bring it to a jeweler or watch shop to have it shortened (he was unable to do it himself, even with help).
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: The Unisex Watch
customer_reviews.text: THIS is the most beautiful watch I have seen in a long, long ti,e. I am so happy with this watch. It should be advertised as a unisex watch, not just a man's watch.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch from Jomashop. Delivered on time and is genuine. The dial is a little more silver-ish than what you see in the pictures, but that's okay.

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments , great buy for the price !

customer_reviews.title: stunninng!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my watch today and it was amazingly beautiful. for a thin wrist woman, its not too big. just a perfect size. I just love michael Kors watches..

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time i am not pleased with a product
customer_reviews.text: Received my watch. Second hand stops moving. Reset time , starts moving again. I am hoping it is only needing a battery, but shouldn't this be taken care of before shipping. This is the first time i am not pleased with a product.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Over-Sized Watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful over-sized watch at least for me b/c I have a very small wrist. It has just the right amount of shine to it. Takes a little getting used to b/c of it's size, but otherwise a good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it

customer_reviews.title: MK
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite MK watch. Large face and looks great. Have no complaints with any of my MK watches. Looks great with lots of silver bracelets.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timepiece

customer_reviews.title: I was initially a little concerned about authenticity because of the price but I'm glad to report the watch was awesome

I've purchased two other MK watches in the past - and I regret not buying them through Jomashop and saving myself some significant money. I'll definitely be a returning customer.

It just take a second to stick it back in, but it's a pain and indicative of cheap construction. I guess you get what you pay for.

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Men's Runway Silver-Tone Watch MK8086
product_meta.description:
Grab the spotlight in this silver-tone stainless steel chronograph.

Iconic sportswear designer Michael Kors is one of the top names in functional American fashion. After working for six years at a French fashion house, Michael Kors launched his first line of womenswear in 1981. Since then Michael Kors has become synonymous with jet-setting, ready-to-wear apparel for men and women. Michael Kors men’s and women’s watches carry on the tradition of runway style, while incorporating classic watch movements and materials. Popular collections utilize on-trend materials such as tortoise and rose gold, or bring a playful spin to classic bracelet and boyfriend styles. With a wide variety of timepieces for every occasion, you will be sure to find a Michael Kors watch that fits you.

Grab the spotlight in this silver-tone stainless steel Michael Kors chronograph.

Length adjusts by having links removed.

See more

 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :3.54 x 3.54 x 3.54 inches; 7.51 Ounces
 * Item model number :MK8086
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :March 15, 2005
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B001IVU1GI
